explains: n. 铁杉；毒芹属植物；毒胡萝卜

sentences.en: A dark wall of trees—red spruce, balsam fir, beech, hemlock—surrounds you.
sentences.cn: 你会被黑暗的树墙包围——红云杉、香脂冷杉、山毛榉和铁杉。

sentences.en: Even with snow on the ground, the high bushy understory is exposed; also snow and wind bring down leafy branches of cedar, hemlock, red alder, and other arboreal fodder.
sentences.cn: 即使地上有雪，高而浓密的下层植被也显露出来；雪和风也会吹落雪松、铁杉、红桤木多叶的树枝和其他的树木草料。

sentences.en: By sucking sap from the young twigs of the hemlock tree, tree growth is retarded by the woolly adelgid, causing needles to change color from deep green to grayish green and to drop prematurely.
sentences.cn: 通过吮吸铁杉幼嫩枝的汁液，树木的生长被毛茸茸的叶蝉阻碍，导致针叶从深绿色变为灰绿色，并提早掉落。
